++ Multiple Routes

MR means there are multiples ways of completing the same task. MR is important to prevent HelpLapse.

Routes are distinguished between manual and automatic.

    * Where possible, when a manual route is used, TheSystem will inform [Users] that an automatic solution exists.

routes to cd update install, automatically detect cd, or run wizard, "please insert cd"
